testcase.name: Verify that when user clicks on add to cart, the product should be added to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User is on login page.................................................passed When User do login..........................................................passed Given User is on homepage...................................................passed When User search product as "Wings of Fire".................................passed And User click on perticular product from suggested prduct..................passed Then User is on product page................................................passed When User click on addtocart Button........................................passed Then User is redirected on the cart page....................................passed
